title: Door Sound Pack
description: 200 Door Sound for your games.Multiple variations to add depth to your game.
longDescription:
🔈View Sound List

🔈View Video Demo


Introducing the "Door Sound Pack," a comprehensive collection of 200 unique sound effects designed specifically for doors and related objects.

This pack includes a wide range of door-related sounds, such as door closes, knocks, creaks, squeaks, locks, unlocks, key movements, lockpicking, slides, hits, and more. With multiple variations for each sound, you have the flexibility to create diverse and immersive audio experiences in your game.

Add an extra layer of suspense and tension to your horror games with these meticulously crafted door sound effects. Whether you need sounds for doors, drawers, windows, or other interactive elements, this pack has you covered.

By incorporating these diverse sound effects into your game, you can truly elevate the immersive experience for your players. The realistic and dynamic door sounds will bring your game world to life, enhancing the atmosphere and increasing player engagement.

The "Door Sound Pack" is a must-have resource for game developers seeking to add depth and authenticity to their projects. From haunted mansions to secret hideouts, these sounds will help you create the perfect auditory environment.

Don't miss out on this extraordinary pack. Open the door to endless possibilities and captivate your players with the "Door Sound Pack."
technicalDetails:
Audio file types: .Wav

Sample rate: 44,100Hz Sample Rate

Bit depth: 320Kbps Bit rate

Number of Audio Waves: 200

Number of Audio Cues: 200

Additional: Stereo

Do Sound Fx Loop: No

Windows and Mac:Yes

Support Dev Platarform: Yes
